title: Cape gooseberry and apple crumble
ingredients: ['Filling', "1 kg (2¼ lb) dessert apples, such as Cox's or Braeburns", '4 tbsp dried blueberries', '4 tbsp orange juice', '100 g (3½ oz) cape gooseberries, papery skins discarded', '1 tbsp sugar', 'Crumble topping', '125 g (4½ oz) plain flour', '100 g (3½ oz) unsalted butter, diced', '55 g (2 oz) caster sugar', '50 g (1¾ oz) rolled oats', '50 g (1¾ oz) hazelnuts or walnuts, chopped', 'grated zest of 1 orange', 'To serve', 'custard']
